title: Enchanting Emerald and Zircon Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: Base metal alloy with micron gold plating. High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
and lustrous Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: A breathtaking blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. The necklace features intricate floral motifs crafted with sparkling CZ stones, interspersed with vibrant pear-cut Emeralds. Delicate pearl drops gracefully dangle from the lower edge, adding a touch of classic elegance. The setting style ensures maximum brilliance from each stone.
colors: complemented by the creamy white hue of the freshwater pearls. The color palette is considered auspicious and celebratory in South Indian traditions.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and formal events.
description: This exquisite Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design elements with a modern sensibility. The vibrant Emeralds symbolize prosperity and growth, while the pearls represent purity and wisdom. The intricate craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The Hyderabadi polish offers enhanced shine and longevity. A true statement piece that embodies grace and sophistication.
